transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: haan ji sir very good afternoon very good evening nagendra ji baat kar rahe hain sir rachna enterprises se
Executive: haan
Customer: nagendra ji main vidhi baat kar rahi thi cinema nagar india mart team se
Customer: hmm
Executive: haan ji actually abhi aapka incoming receive hua tha hame kya problem face kar rahe hain sir services ke regarding aap
Customer: account close karna chahta tha to
Executive: kya sir
Customer: account close karna tha
Executive: kyu sir
Customer: business close karna tha to isliye
Executive: but sir business close kyu karna hai aapko wahi main puchna chah rahi hu
Customer: sir loss mein tha
Executive: but services vagera to aap proper use kar rahe ho sir
Customer: haan
Executive: services vagera to aap use kar rahe ho sir
Customer: use kar raha tha haan aapko kannada aata hai
Executive: nahi sir hindi aur english
Customer: and aapka shayad production bhi sir hindi aur english mein hi to hua hai right
Customer: no sir no madam aapka sir to hindi aur english add kar but is only kannada
Executive: sir jab aapki hosting hui thi hamari team ne aapko connect kiya tha right to aapne pura production to english aur hindi mein hi karaya hai sir humne recording suni hui hai aapki to i hope ki aapko thodi hindi english aati hai right
Customer: thodi aati hai but explanation kaise karunga kannada nahi aata
Executive: but sir yahan par to koi bhi kannad ka person available nahi hai aapka last time hamara discussion hua tha aapke sath mein to aap ye bol rahe the ki lead vagera utni achi nahi aa rahi hai
Customer: thoda okay account close karna chahta tha kaise kya karna chahta to bole
Customer: account close karna chahta
Executive: account close kyu karna hai sir pehli cheez theek hai dusri cheez ye hai ki aap use bhi kar rahe ho aapko service related jo bhi problem aa rahi hai uske liye humne aapko ek account manager assign kiya hai sir
Customer: business close karna chahta
Executive: business hi close kar rahe ho aap
Customer: haan
Executive: matlab aapke jo rachna enterprises hai iska business hi close kar rahe ho aap
Customer: close karna chahta haan
Executive: but sir yahan se to close nahi hoga na abhi ab to aapko one year continue karna padega sir
Customer: sir aapko option milega agar close karna chahta to option milega tha tha
Executive: nahi sir aisa to koi option hi nahi hai hamare pass kyuki dekho jab aapne onboard kiya hoga to aapka to ye hoga na ki main aapko continue hi karna india mart ke sath mein ya apna business hai aap wo run kar rahe ho continue right then aapne onboard kiya yahan pe to aise mid of the year close nahi hota sir profile
Customer: [unintelligible] kannada [unintelligible]
Executive: kya sir
Executive: hello koi person available hai aapke aas pass jisko proper hindi aur english aati ho
Customer: no
Executive: koi bhi nahi hai
Customer: haan
Executive: hum aise hi discuss kar lete hain sir pehli cheez aap ye bol rahe ho ki aapko apna account close karana hai right
Customer: haan ya
Executive: theek hai main aapko revert kar deti hu kyuki account aise close nahi hota hai sir mid of the year
Customer: no kyu
Executive: sir kyuki business available hai aapki product line mein aap use bhi kar rahe ho service
Customer: haan use nahi ho to close karna chahta but sir ye to aapne jab aap onboard hue the tab aapne pucha tha unse ki aise close ho jata hai ya nahi hota kyuki ye to tabhi bata diya jata hai ki account aap aise close nahi kara sakte mid of the year
Executive: main keh rahi hu ki ye to aap sirf aapko bataya gaya hoga na ki saal ke beech mein aap aise close nahi kara sakte aap apna account
Customer: pehle open kar raha tha to sales sales executive ne bola tha mid mein aur three month mein close karna chahta tha bola tha but is kaise bolenge madam aap sales sales executive bola tha
Executive: sir koi recording sir sir sir koi recording hai aapke pass ya unhone kahin pe aapko written mein kahin diya hai likh ke ki agar aapko close karna hai to aap close kar sakte ho
Customer: haan hai aapke pass aap bolenge return return voice record but tumhare ko sales hona chahiye to
Executive: aisa nahi hai sir dekhiye jab aap koi cheez kharidte ho right aap jaise shopping karne jate ho to aap sari cheeze check karke hi lete ho na sir
Executive: right
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: kya keh rahe hain sir
Executive: and continue kijiye sir band karne ka koi wo nahi hai aapko aapke account manager number bhi share kiya whatsapp pe
Customer: uske liye kannada nahi aata tha manager ko uske communication simply hota to sale sale karna chahta to kaise malum
Executive: i understand aap jin clients ko connect karte ho by need jo consume karte ho wo aap apne local ki karte hoge na sir karnataka ki ya udhar south side ki hi karte hoge na aap
Customer: lead manager ko kaise communication karna chahta chahta tha
Executive: theek hai aap abhi online aa sakte ho video meeting se main connect kar sakti hu aapko aap aaiye main aapko usme batati hu kaise aap usko convert kar sakte ho wahan se translator use karke ya language select karke main aapke phone mein on kara deti hu fir aapko easy ho jayega lead manager use karna
Customer: koi bhi kannada wala lead manager nahi aapka india mart mein
Executive: sir lead manager hota hai aapki service use ke liye haan koi person available nahi hai yahan pe jo aapse kannad mein baat kar paye
Executive: hindi english aati hai sabko
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to close the account.

- Business is in loss.

- Kannada language support needed for lead manager.



Resolution:

- Explained account closure not possible mid-year.

- Offered video meeting to explain lead conversion.

- Informed lead manager is for service use.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- account closure, lead manager, kannada language, business loss
